comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: New Brighton is not in Liverpool, it's across the river in Wallasey

comment.author: 86226435@N00
comment._content: Well it's not in Wallasey, it's in New Brighton. On The Wirral. My mum grew up in New Brighton and my dad came from Wallasey. My mum used to be a donkey girl at the fair in New Brighton, leading rich kids on donkey rides. Tho that was some years later in the 1950s.

comment.author: 86226435@N00
comment._content: Thanks for those great links to hi res pics etc btw.
